Differin Daily Oil Free Hydrating Cleanser

Brand: Differin

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: WATER, GLYCERIN, SODIUM COCOYL GLUTAMATE, GLUCONOLACTONE, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, NIACINAMIDE, SODIUM CITRATE, XANTHAN GUM, CITRIC ACID, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, PROPANEDIOL, SODIUM CHLORIDE, SODIUM COCOYL ALANINATE, ZINC GLUCONATE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, GLYCOL

RYLYL GLYCOL, GLYCOLIC ACID, MANDELIC ACID

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
